accessoryshoe: ISO 518 hot-shoe with sync and data contacts and safety lock
bracketing: Exposure bracketing: 3 shots in steps of 1/3 or 1/2 EV White balance bracketing: 3 shots in steps of 1 Active D-Lighting bracketing: 2 shots
nikoncreativelightingsystemcls: Advanced Wireless Lighting supported with SB-910, SB-900, SB-800, or SB-700 as a master flash or SU-800 as commander; Flash Color Information Communication supported with all CLS-compatible flash units
weight: Approx. 555 g (1 lb 3.6 oz) with battery and memory card but without body cap; approx. 505 g/1 lb 1.8 oz (camera body only)
isosensitivity: ISO 100 to 6400; can also be set to approx. 0.3, 0.7, 1, or 2 EV (ISO 25600 equivalent) above ISO 6400
metering: TTL exposure metering using main image sensor
exposurecompensation: Can be adjusted by -5 - +5 EV in increments of 1/3 or 1/2 EV in P, S, A, and M modes
flashmode: Auto, auto with red-eye reduction, auto slow sync, auto slow sync with red-eye reduction, fill-flash, red-eye reduction, slow sync, slow sync with red-eye reduction, rear-curtain with slow sync, rear-curtain sync, off
meteringmode: TTL exposure metering using 2016-pixel RGB sensor
speed: 1/4000 - 30 s in steps of 1/3 or 1/2 EV; Bulb; Time (requires optional ML-L3 remote control)
suppliedaccessories: EN-EL14 rechargeable Li-ion battery (with terminal cover), MH-24 battery charger, AN-DC3 strap, UC-E17 USB cable, EG-CP16 audio/video cable, DK-5 eyepiece cap, BS-1 accessory shoe cover, DK-20 rubber eyecup, BF-1B body cap, ViewNX 2 CD-ROM, User's Manual
flashcompensation: -3 - +1 EV in increments of 1/3 or 1/2 EV
monitor: 7.5-cm (3-in.), approx. 921k-dot (VGA), vari-angle TFT monitor with 170 Â° viewing angle, approx. 100% frame coverage, and brightness adjustment
audiorecordingdevice: Built-in or external stereo microphone; sensitivity adjustable
isosensitivityrecommendedexposureindex: ISO 100 - 6400 in steps of 1/3 EV. Can also be set to approx. 0.3, 0.7, 1, or 2 EV (ISO 25600 equivalent) above ISO 6400; auto ISO sensitivity control available
media: SD (Secure Digital) and UHS-I compliant SDHC and SDXC memory cards
magnification: Approx. 0.78 x (50 mm f/1.4 lens at infinity, -1.0 m-1)
playback: Full-frame and thumbnail (4, 9, or 72 images or calendar) playback with playback zoom, movie playback, photo and/or movie slide shows, histogram display, highlights, auto image rotation, and image comment (up to 36 characters)
focuspoint: Can be selected from 39 or 11 focus points
autofocus: Contrast-detect AF anywhere in frame (camera selects focus point automatically when face-priority AF or subject-tracking AF is selected)
flashsyncspeed: X=1/200 s; synchronizes with shutter at 1/200 s or slower
lensservo: Autofocus (AF): Single-servo AF (AF-S); full-time-servo AF (AF-F) Manual focus (MF)
accessoryterminal: Wireless remote controller: WR-R10 wireless remote controller (available separately)Remote cord: MC-DC2 (available separately)GPS unit: GP-1 (available separately)
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (Portugal and Brazil), Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian
releasemode: Single frame, continuous L, continuous H, self-timer, delayed remote; ML-L3, quick-response remote; ML-L3, quiet shutter release; interval timer photography supported
picturecontrolsystem: Standard, Neutral, Vivid, Monochrome, Portrait, Landscape; selected Picture Control can be modified; storage for custom Picture Controls
whitebalance: Auto, incandescent, fluorescent (7 types), direct sunlight, flash, cloudy, shade, preset manual, all except preset manual with fine-tuning.
focuslock: Focus can be locked by pressing shutter-release button halfway (single-servo AF) or by pressing AE-L/AF-L button
effectiveangleofview: Nikon DX format; focal length equivalent to approx. 1.5x that of lenses with FX format angle of view
focusingscreen: Type B BriteView Clear Matte Mark VII screen
guidenumber: Approx. 12/39, 13/43 with manual flash (m/ft, ISO 100, 20 Â°C/68 Â°F)
flashcontrol: TTL: i-TTL flash control using 2016-pixel RGB sensor is available with built-in flash and SB-910, SB-900, SB-800, SB-700, SB-600, or SB-400; i-TTL balanced fill-flash for digital SLR is used with matrix and center-weighted metering, standard i-TTL flash for digital SLR with spot metering
afareamode: Face-priority AF, wide-area AF, normal-area AF, subject-tracking AF
eyepoint: 17.9 mm (-1.0 m-1; from center surface of viewfinder eyepiece lens)
acadapter: EH-5b AC adapter; requires EP-5A power connector (available separately)
flashreadyindicator: Lights when built-in flash or optional flash unit is fully charged; flashes after flash is fired at full output
compatiblelenses: Autofocus is available with AF-S and AF-I lenses. Autofocus is not available with other type G and D lenses, AF lenses (IX NIKKOR and lenses for the F3AF are not supported), and AI-P lenses. Non-CPU lenses can be used in mode M, but the camera exposure meter will not function. The electronic rangefinder can be used with lenses that have a maximum aperture of f/5.6 or faster.
builtinflash: Auto, portrait, child, close up, night portrait, party/indoor, pet portrait, color sketch: Auto flash with auto pop-up P, S, A, M, food: Manual pop-up with button release
automaticsceneselection: Available in auto and auto (flash off) modes
activedlighting: Auto, extra high, high, normal, low, off
rangeiso100f14lens20c68f: Matrix or center-weighted metering: 0-20 EVSpot metering: 2-20 EV
framesizepixelsandframerate: 1920 x 1080, 60i (59.94 fields/s)/ 50i (50 fields/s)*, high/normal 1920 x 1080, 30 p (progressive)/25p/24p, high/normal 1280 x 720, 60p/50p, high/normal 640 x 424, 30p/25p, high/normal Frame rates of 30p (actual frame rate 29.97 fps), 60i, and 60p (actual frame rate 59.94 fps) are available when NTSC is selected for video mode. 25p, 50i, and 50p are available when PAL is selected for video mode. Actual frame rate when 24p is selected is 23.976 fps. * Sensor output is about 60 or 50 fps.
mode: Auto modes (auto; auto (flash off)); programmed auto with flexible program (P); shutter-priority auto (S); aperture-priority auto (A); manual (M); scene modes (portrait; landscape; child; sports; close up; night portrait; night landscape; party/indoor; beach/snow; sunset; dusk/dawn; pet portrait; candlelight; blossom; autumn colors; food); special effects modes (night vision; color sketch; miniature effect; selective color; silhouette; high key; low key)
filesystem: DCF (Design Rule for Camera File System) 2.0, DPOF (Digital Print Order Format), Exif (Exchangeable Image File Format for Digital Still Cameras) 2.3, PictBridge
exposurelock: Luminosity locked at detected value with AE-L/AF-L button
dustreductionsystem: Image sensor cleaning, Image Dust Off reference data (optional Capture NX 2 software required)
